# c-table



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute           | Description                    | Type      | Default |
| ------------------ | ------------------- | ------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `mobileBreakpoint` | `mobile-breakpoint` | Mobile breakpoint in pixels    | `number`  | `600`   |
| `responsive`       | `responsive`        | Should the table be responsive | `boolean` | `false` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                              | Description                                      |
| --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `--c-table-border-color`          | Table border color                               |
| `--c-table-header-color`          | Table border color                               |
| `--c-table-row-background-mobile` | Background color for table rows (even) in mobile |
